name: Catching
description:
Caching is a game of chase in a restaurant.
Be a bully, mess up a restaurant, or be a restaurant manager to stop it.
Caching provides multiplayer for up to six people.
Enjoy an exciting chase with a cute character with casual graphics.

The bad guys mess up the restaurant and win if any of the bad guys survive to Feel free to run away.

The restaurant manager wins if he keeps all the villains from being persecuted or disturbed. Realize justice with a frying pan
